revised_title: Search for a Heavier Constituent of the Atmosphere
tldr: The author conducted experiments using the mass-spectrograph to search for a heavier constituent in the atmosphere. They analyzed samples from liquid air residues and found two previously undiscovered isotopes of xenon but no evidence of a heavier element in the range of 210-230 atomic weight. This research improved the understanding of atomic number and the periodic law, narrowing the search for a heavier element in the atmosphere.
